title: spec: a "bare" return is an error if it appears within a hole in the scope of the named return parameters
body:
The behaviour of this program:

 http://play.golang.org/p/tEU43CJdAn

is not explained by the spec:

 http://golang.org/ref/spec#Return_statements

which should describe the error that results from a "bare" return within a
hole-in-scope of the named result parameters.
